content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ AI-recommended events for enhanced Workbench insight correlation June 9, 2025—Workbench now intelligently surfaces AI-recommended events related to endpoints within an existing insight. These recommendations help you: Discover related activity that may not have been initially included in the insight. Add relevant events directly to the insight for further correlation. This feature can give you a more complete and accurate picture of a potential incident and accelerate your investigation by uncovering hidden connections and suspicious activity that might otherwise go unnoticed. XDR Threat Detection → Workbench © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: AI-recommended events for enhanced Workbench insight correlation
